text: Hi there!
Hi
I'd like to try and get us to donate some money together from our earnings to Save the Children
Okay, how much were you thinking?
I was thinking at least $1, but if you're ok with a little more that would be great. Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment.
How much is the task payment
It is $2.  The money goes to help children in warzones with health care, education and safety. It seems like a small price to pay to help out a needy kid, right?
Yeah, I guess.
How much do you like to donate to the charity?
Were you thinking one dollar each or 50 cents each to make a total of $1?
Are you comfortable with $1? I almost feel like we have a moral obligation to donate $2 each but it's up to you
To be honest I am not comfortable with donating. I would rather donate a lower amount than $1 if we decide on donating anything at all
why are you not comfortable? Is it that you  cannot afford to? Or you don't know the charity Save the Children?
I can not afford. I believe we should help ourselves before reaching out to others in need. Additionally, I don't know what exactly Save the Children is using this money for
It is just a dollar, geeze.  As I mentioned they are using it to help children who are starving, injured or who have lost their parents. You can look up the charity to see they are legitimate.
In my opinion, every dollar counts. Unless I get to see with my own eyes what the charity is doing, then I don't know if they are legitimate or not
You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment. I would donate $2 because I know there are a lot of kids out there who need the help and to me, $2 is nothing
I choose to donate $0 then
Wow, pathetic, do you have kids?
No, I don't have kids. Please respect my decision
I hope you don't consider yourself to be a Christian, the hypocrisy would be laughable
I have no idea why you chose to put religion into this. I am not religious and your decision to bring Christianity into this is ignorant
